# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its high worth to you at $15000, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing us to maximize the product's potential impact on your business. I look forward to your positive consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
